title: Ticket #2674: condor_prio usage info is wrong
description:
When correcting the condor_prio man page (for 7.6.5), noticed that the usage info could not possibly be right. This is the current output of version 7.6.4: 

   Usage: condor_prio [{+|-}priority ] [-p priority] [ -a ] [-n schedd_name] [ -pool pool_name ] [user | cluster | cluster.proc] ...

Here is a better stab at what the usage info ought to be. 

  condor_prio
    + value  |  - value  |  -p newvalue
    [ -n  schedd_name  ]
    [ -p  pool_name   -n  schedd_name  ]
    cluster.proc  |  cluster  |  username  |  -a

Note that there are 2 required arguments. One specifies the change in priority or the new priority value. The other specifies which job(s) are to have a change in their priority.
